name: "The Ballad of Steely Joe"-Episode 10 of "SAJV" Quiz | Television | 10 Questions

questions.text: At the start of this episode, what is Rebecca wearing?
questions.explanation:
The catsuit.

	Because this episode is continued from the previous one, "Let There Be Light", Rebecca is still wearing her suit. She put it on in the previous episode to have easier manueveurability when shooting bad guys.

questions.text: When this story's evil villains (Quantrill and his gang) steal the Aurora, who is on board?
questions.explanation:
Passepartout.

	These so not nice guys make fun of Passepartout's accent (granted, it can be laughable at times) and threaten him with guns.

questions.text: Who does Rebecca get to flirt with in this episode? (Hint: they meet him on a riverboat.)
questions.explanation:
Sam Clemens.

	Sam Clemens, played by Jonathan Walker, is a charming Southern gentleman. Little does Rebecca know that he will one day be Mark Twain, one of the greatest American novelists of all time.

questions.text: When Passepartout escapes from his captors, what is the first name of the woman who helps him out by giving him a disguise?
questions.explanation:
Lily.

	Phileas gets someone to flirt with, too, although he is a bit subtler than Rebecca.

questions.text: What colour is the suit that Phileas wears when he practices drawing?
questions.explanation:
Rust.

	Phileas also wears this same suit in "Rockets' Red Glare". Not the most flattering colour!

questions.text: What is the name of the riverboat on which Rebecca and her new "friend" meet?
questions.explanation:
Memphis Belle.

	Phileas: "The Memphis Belle should be arriving in approximately 62 seconds."

questions.text: When Phileas plays poker with Quantrill, what does he win with?
questions.explanation:
A full house.

	But according to Quantrill, Phileas has "played poker with the wrong man", because this desperado happens to be a very bad sport. He and his gang rob everyone that happens to be in the room, and refuse to give Phileas his winnings.

questions.text: What was the first name of Lily's late husband?
questions.explanation:
Harry.

	Harry was killed when he and Lily moved out west in a covered wagon by some outlaws.

questions.text: When Quantrill sneaks up behind Sam, who is printing the newspaper, how does Rebecca knock him out?
questions.correct: She hits him with a newspaper press
options: She throws a brick at him
questions.explanation:
She hits him with a newspaper press.

	Rebecca: "Amazing, the power of the printed word." Okay, so that's just a bit too cheesy, but at least she saved Sam's life.

Dixie Seatle.

	I don't know if that accent's real or not, but she does a great job. Thanks for playing my quiz :).
